name: Abhay Mittal

projects.title: Prompt Marketplace
projects.description: It is an NFT marketplace where users can buy and sell prompts. Prompts are ideas or sentences that are 'novel' and can be used to generate useful content on AI generators such as GPT-3, DALLE-2, ChatGPT, Dreambooth StableDiffusion and others. Tech Stack: Solidity(Smart Contracts), Foundry, React, NextJS, Pinata Submarine

projects.title: Voice based COVID-19 Diagnosis
projects.description: Developed an end-to-end web-app for COVID-19 detection and diagnosis. The app uses machine learning, neural networks and sound processing to distinguish positive and negative samples.Tech Stack ‚Äì Flask, Python, HTML, CSS, Keras, Tensorflow

projects.title: Stable Diffusion Web App
projects.description: Developed a web-app in react for Stable Diffusion 1.5. Used the huggingface Inference Endpoint for Backend/API.

services.title: Front-end Development
services.description: I will help you build pixel-perfect client-side web applications using modern frameworks React, Svelte, Next.jS

services.title: Smart Contracts
services.description: With deep expertise in Solidity, revolutionize your business with smart contract development services for the Ethereum blockchain.

services.title: Generative AI
services.description: Deploy powerful ML apps. I will help you build pipelines, fine-tune models, and help you build your own generative AI web-app

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: Combining creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations in blender that bring your project to life.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to thousands of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Built the client application for Stable diffusion from scratch with features such as TOS Login Authentication Premium mode etc

Primarily focused on the product: Satmetrix ‚Äì A feedback management enterprise software.,  Wrote several modern theme pages in React as part of a new feature(Web Intercept) and Introduced a new microservice to an existing monolithic architecture , Built CI/CD pipelines in Jenkins and used the Robot Framework to create and maintain automation scripts.

experiences.position: Research Intern at Center for Police Research
experiences.bullets: Worked on the project: Automatic License Plate Recognition System
